metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25775 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Improper access control in the Intel(R) Ethernet Controller RDMA driver forlinux before version 1.9.30 may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable escalation of privilege via network access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25775` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-lowlatency - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-snapdragon - 5.4.0-9.12
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-89-generic - 5.15.0-89.99~20.04.1
